definition.text: An Action is somthing that users of the system can triggeer via the UI, usually by clicking on a Menu Item of a Node. Actions can also be triggered by other actions enabling a resulable set of functionality to be available to users of the Design Space. Once triggered the action executes pre-defined code.

paragraphs.text: Left click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode. Then you can use docs.save to save your changes and app.contribute to send it to the main repository.
